name: static-site
description: This README generator is a command-line application that helps developers quickly create a professional README for a new project. The acceptance criteria for the project specify that the application should prompt the user for information about their project and generate a README file with sections for Description, Table of Contents, Installation, Usage, License, Contributing, Tests, and Questions. The application should also generate a badge for the chosen license and provide a link to the user's GitHub profile and contact information. ## Your Task
